bookmark.title: Emacs modes for Python
bookmark.desc: This site contains some useful elisp packages such as a Python mode, a debugger mode etc.

bookmark.title: PTUI
bookmark.desc: A Tkinter-based IDE by Zachary Roadhouse.

bookmark.title: CoolEdit
bookmark.desc: A text editor with Python scripting internally. XWindows-only.

bookmark.title: UltraEdit
bookmark.desc: A general text editor for Windows. Python syntax support can be downloaded separately.

bookmark.title: The Python Journal
bookmark.desc: A web journal devoted to Python.

bookmark.title: Python-Friendly ISPs
bookmark.desc: A list of web host providers that also provide Python access for CGI and suchlike.
